update kt_evidence
evidence_id = #{evidenceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cancer_key = #{cancerKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
doid = #{doid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
doid_name = #{doidName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
variant_key = #{variantKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
variant_id = #{variantId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
evidence_type = #{evidenceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
evidence_level = #{evidenceLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
evidence_direction = #{evidenceDirection,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
summary = #{summary,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=BIGINT},
created_way = #{createdWay,jdbcType=INTEGER},
created_by_key = #{createdByKey,jdbcType=CHAR},
created_by_name = #{createdByName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
check_state = #{checkState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
check_report = #{checkReport,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
checked_by_key = #{checkedByKey,jdbcType=CHAR},
checked_by_name = #{checkedByName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
translate_by_key = #{translateByKey,jdbcType=CHAR},
translate_by_name = #{translateByName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where evidence_key = #{evidenceKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update kt_evidence set evidence_id = #{evidenceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cancer_key = #{cancerKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, doid = #{doid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, doid_name = #{doidName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, variant_key = #{variantKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, variant_id = #{variantId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, evidence_type = #{evidenceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, evidence_level = #{evidenceLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, evidence_direction = #{evidenceDirection,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, summary = #{summary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=BIGINT}, created_way = #{createdWay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, created_by_key = #{createdByKey,jdbcType=CHAR}, created_by_name = #{createdByName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, check_state = #{checkState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, check_report = #{checkReport,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, checked_by_key = #{checkedByKey,jdbcType=CHAR}, checked_by_name = #{checkedByName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, translate_by_key = #{translateByKey,jdbcType=CHAR}, translate_by_name = #{translateByName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where evidence_key = #{evidenceKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update kt_evidence set check_state = #{checkState,jdbcType=BIGINT}, checked_by_key = #{checkedByKey,jdbcType=CHAR}, checked_by_name = #{checkedByName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, check_report = #{checkReport} where evidence_key = #{evidenceKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT count(evidence_key) from kt_evidence where check_state = #{checkState} and created_way = #{createdWay}
SELECT count(evidence_key) from kt_evidence where (created_at BETWEEN #{firstTime} and #{currentTime}) AND check_state = #{checkState} and created_way = #{createdWay}
